channel.title: Need a good Server Base
channel.description:
[ul][b]Please read all the requirement(s) Before posting:[/b]
Hey Moparscape! I am making a new new Project coded just by me-I want no help from others unless I get errors :P This is gonna be something big-I can feel it.I don't want any Sql or Dodian sources etc.The server must have like basic commands such as: [list] [li]Pickup[/li] [li]Bank[/li] [/list] [list] [li]Maybe pnpc[/li] [li]::coordson or something like ::mypos-That is a must[/li] [/list] [list] [list] [li]Please nothing Varrock based[/li] [li]If its lumby,edge or anywhere else that has a good amount of room-that's fine[/li] [/list] [list][li]Master maybe?[/li] [li]Some basic shops.[/li] [/list]Also Don't tell me to download a list of these sources either: [list] [li]Anything with fr33sc4p3[/li] [li]Project 16[/li] [/list] [list] [li]Pimpscape[/li] [li]Testscape[/li] [/list] [list] [li]Anything Chez in it[/li] [li]Owntscape[/li] [/list] [list] [li]Make sure you have a download link or topic link[/li] [li]Please make sure it has global objects[/li] [/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: Need a good Server Base
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

whitescape

one of my fav’s

and put the globals in it yourself heres the voids (credits to fedexer)

public void deletethatobject(int objectX, int objectY) { 
	ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10);
	}
public void deletethatwall(int objectX, int objectY) {
	ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 0);
	}
public void AddObject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face) {
		outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60);
		outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8));
		outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8));
		/*CREATE OBJECT*/
		if (NewObjectID > -1) {
			outStream.writeByte(151);
			outStream.writeByteS(0);
			outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID);
			outStream.writeByteA(Face); //0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
		}
		outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
	}
public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
		for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
			if(p != null){
				client person = (client)p;
			if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){
				if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
					person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	}
public void Deleteobjects() {
         }
public void Deletewalls() {
}
public void NewObjects() {
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good Server Base
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“Evan`, post:11, topic:155447”][quote author=rs w00dcut link=topic=212201.msg1854874#msg1854874 date=1193713476]

[quote author=Aff link=topic=212201.msg1854846#msg1854846 date=1193712856]
/fail

If you’re dling a “Good Source”, editting it and claiming it’s yours… You’re a noob, it’s not yours if you’ve copied off pretty much everything from the base.

And if you want all that, just go get Project 16 and add that shit in, then add whatever updates you have… Also, pretty much EVERY base was made from either Whitescape, or any other REAL ORIGINAL bases made from SCRATCH…

Gf.
[/quote]why did you join mopar?
To be a faggot and say
/fail!! omg lel lulz! failz!! fale!! epic fale!!
GF M8 GF GF GF lel lul! /fale!
[/quote]Why did you join moparscape to pretend you can edit a few things and then you go and ask how to add a command LOL.[/quote]I wanted suggestions on a good server base.
Why are you here?

Read full topic
